moreBlocks.lawyersAtLewis&Tompkins,P.C.SelectedForA: • Tompkins, David E. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Founded in 1958, the law firm of Lewis & Tompkins, P.C., provides dedicated personal injury representation to clients in Bethesda, Maryland, and throughout the state, as well as in Virginia and Washington, D.C. We are passionate about helping people who are injured due to the negligent actions of others to achieve financial justice for the damages they have suffered.

Offering customized counsel and focused advocacy, our law firm helps injured people to recover the maximum compensation for their medical expenses, loss of income, pain and suffering, and other such losses. Drawing on our team’s diverse knowledge and experience, we handle personal injury cases involving a wide range of issues such as car accidents, trucking accidents, motorcycle wrecks, mass transportation accidents, defective products, medical malpractice, birth injuries and wrongful death.

In an instant, people’s lives may be forever changed by injuries suffered in accidents or otherwise due to the negligence of others. Our law firm offers free initial consultations, during which we take the time to not only fully explain their legal rights and options, but also gain an understanding of how their lives have been affected by their injuries so we can pursue full and fair compensation on their behalf.

Our team at Lewis & Tompkins, P.C., understands the emotional as well as the financial toll that suffering injuries as a result of another’s negligence or carelessness can take on those injured and their families. When clients work with our law firm, they can take comfort knowing they will never be given cookie-cutter counsel or be treated as though they are just another file number. During our regular office hours, people speak to someone from our firm when they call, and they will make every effort to answer the questions at that time or take a message.
